description:
Su-37UB Terminator is a modified two-seater model of the Soviet Su-37 TSF. It takes a leaf from the operational records of the USA`s F-14 and F-18 TSFs, with the ultimate goal of having two pilots being to reduce combat-related mental and physical stress by sharing the load.
One Su-37UB, stationed at the UN`s Yukon Base under the banner of Project PROMINENCE, is operated by the Scarlet Sisters Inia Sestina and Cryska Barchenowa, a pair of Soviet pilots famous at the base for the excellent chemistry of their relationship and their near-flawless combat records.
name: Su-37UB Terminator
